name: Skator Gator
description:
SKATOR GATOR was just minding his own business when those greedy capitalist robots started ruining his swamp!

They’re draining the peat bog just to make mini golf courses!?

Skate across their oil pipelines towards the city to advocate for change and cause some mayhem along the way.

High octane, lane-based platforming challenges!


The pipelines stretch far and wide, with gator eggs scattered all about, robots trying to take you out, obstacles blocking your path, and much more that’ll truly challenge your mad skateboarding skills!

20+ levels to unlock and play!


It’s a long way to the city - Greenjamin has multiple levels to skate through in three different areas, plus there’s a few secret levels too...

Multiple gators to release into the swamp!


Rescue all those gator eggs and you’ll be able to change your look to fit your needs! Gotta look your best too, yeah?

Special developer times on each level!


We know you can skate the skate, but are you a rad enough skater that can beat our times? Think again, gator!
